oracle.pg.common

Class VertexCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.VertexCache

  • public class VertexCache
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a cache layer for OracleVertexBase objects. Note that by design each graph will have its own vertices cache.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearCache()
      This method empties the cache
      void dumpStatistics(java.io.PrintStream ps)

      Fetch one vertex from the cache using its ID.

      This method returns an instance of VertexCache.
      void put(java.lang.Long lID, OracleVertexBase v)
      Add one vertex to the cache.

      Add one vertex to the cache

      Remove one Vertex from the cache

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        This method empties the cache

      • dumpStatistics

        public void dumpStatistics(java.io.PrintStream ps)

      • get

        public OracleVertexBase get(java.lang.Long lID)
        Fetch one vertex from the cache using its ID. If the vertex is not in the cache, then return NULL.

      • getInstance

        public static VertexCache getInstance(OraclePropertyGraphBase opg)
        This method returns an instance of VertexCache. Note that there is a 1:1 mapping between property graph names and VertexCache objects

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.Long lID,
                OracleVertexBase v)
        Add one vertex to the cache. TODO: avoid two separate calls to this API with the same IDs but different vertices.

      • put

        public void put(OracleVertexBase v)
        Add one vertex to the cache

      • remove

        public OracleVertexBase remove(java.lang.Long lID)
        Remove one Vertex from the cache

      • remove

        public OracleVertexBase remove(OracleVertexBase v)
        Remove one Vertex from the cache
